original_title: Drake Sather: The Man Who Created Zoolander
overview: A look at Sather's life and comic career and the impact his death had on his friends, family, and the greater world around him. We get comments from Stiller, Gallen, Wilson, Ferrell, and filmmaker Judd Apatow. We get some thoughts about Sather - the character co-creator who died in 2004 - as well as the development of Zoolander.
title: Drake Sather: The Man Who Created Zoolander
